title: Self-Directed Course for Enhancing Science Education Leadership Competencies Using Generative AI

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate or Higher Expertise in Science, Basic Proficiency in Digital Device Usage
context.additional_context: Focuses on strengthening ethical instructional design competencies through generative AI for corporate science education managers/leaders.

learning_goals: Analyze the technical principles of generative AI and its application cases in science education to utilize in instructional design.
Develop science education scenarios that incorporate ethical considerations (transparency, accountability) in AI prompt design.
Complete an AI-based science experiment design project considering the "interactive" level of the ICAP framework.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
